physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water with a bridge in the background. Main cables can be seen extending from the towers of the bridge. There is a boat and a couple of bigger watercrafts in operation. Buildings can be seen in the background of the photograph.
title_text: Cavenagh Bridge Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Singapore River (Singapore) Cavenagh Bridge (Singapore)
